name: Leasing Technologies International
overview:
Leasing Technologies International, Inc. (“LTI”) is an organization of innovators dedicated to meeting the financing and equipment needs of emerging growth companies. LTI customers are primarily companies focused in the technology, software, energy, medical and security industries. We acquire and lease business equipment essentials like security devices, computers and servers, lab and test equipment, communications equipment, manufacturing and production equipment and office automation equipment.

Our mission is to help companies grow and facilitate their business success - by preserving their working capital through innovative equipment financing as well as those more mature companies requiring structured finance.
